entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 06 at 3:23PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STORM FORCE LOW LIKELY SATURDAY... A strong, developing storm force low moving up from the south will bring strong winds, high seas, and heavy rain for the southern panhandle and outer coast. Adjustments in the track of the low will cause different impacts for each part of the panhandle, however, the southern panhandle and outer coast are likely to see the strongest
